SELECT DATE_FORMAT( update_time, '%Y-%m' ) xNameData, count( report_code ) xValData FROM t_report_info WHERE organ_id = #{organId} AND report_status = "6" AND DATE_FORMAT( update_time, '%Y-%m' ) > DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB( CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH ), '%Y-%m' ) GROUP BY xNameData ORDER BY xNameData

SELECT ri.id reportId, ri.job_id jobId, sj.project_name projectName, st.offer_id offerId FROM t_report_info ri LEFT JOIN t_schedule_job sj ON sj.id = ri.job_id LEFT JOIN t_schedule_task st ON st.id = sj.task_id WHERE ri.report_code = #{reportCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} and ri.organ_id = #{organId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
